pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Friday, December 13, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Montréal, Quebec

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Quebec, François Legault. Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Intergovernmental Affairs Chrystia Freeland and Leader of the Government in the House of Commons and Quebec Lieutenant Pablo Rodriguez will be in attendance.

Ministère du Conseil exécutif
770, rue Sherbrooke Ouest

Notes for media:    

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media are asked to present themselves to the lobby no later than 1:15 p.m.

Media appearance

5:00 p.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on RDI’s En direct avec Patrice Roy.
